body_html: This is caused by square root in definition of tf.norm. IE you are taking gradient of sqrt(x^2). Gradient of sqrt approaches infinity, whereas gradient of x^2 approaches 0, so computing them separately then multiplying is a problem. @goodfeli -- do you remember if Theano uses some standard stabilizing transformation for this kind of case?
